title: Do Not Disturb Makes No Sound for Call from Starred Contacts
content:
My device is set to "Do Not Disturb" but to interrupt for calls from starred contacts. However, calls from starred contacts do not ring.

I checked my sound settings and "ring & notification volume" is turned on and loud. 

If I change the "Do Not Distrub" settings to interrupt for calls from any contacts, it still does not ring when a contact calls.

The only time it will ring in "Do Not Disturb" is if I set it to interrupt for *any* call.

So it's something to do with the contacts not interacting with "Do Not Disturb" maybe? I just updated to Android 11, problems started after update.
